<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Description="Executes a Powershell script on a local device" ScriptPath="" ScriptCode="[xml]$xmlfile = @"
<NewDataSet>
%initialXML%
</NewDataSet>
"@

$json = Convertto-json ($xmlfile.selectNodes("//NewDataSet/*") | select %columnString%)
$json" scriptSource="1" TableAsString="" HasParams="0" HostId="-1" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="PowerShellScript" label="PowerShell Script" description="Executes a Powershell script on a local device" notes="" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
